content: *knit cozy hats and mittens for the whole family in the round in patons canadiana patons yarns * skill level intermediate yarn requirements patons® canadiana 3 5 oz/100 g hat *version 1 striped version * main color mc #10145 dark water blue or #10744 medium teal contrast a #10630 burnt orange or #10704 tomato red contrast b #10610 fool s gold or #10046 pale grey mix contrast c #10006 winter white or #10628 tangy *4 colors 1 ball each* *version 2 contrast band version * main color mc #10345 dark amethyst contrast a #10332 deep orchid *2 colors 1 ball each* *version 3 solid version * #10044 medium grey mix 1 ball sizes 4 mm u s 6 and 4 5 mm u s 7 knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge stitch holder pom-pom and grafting diagrams are included in pdf download february 2012 french version february 2012 chapeau et mitaines de base travaillé avec un jeu de 4 aig pointues aux deux bouts 1 see also basic hat and mittens on 4 needles mittens 2 2-needle hat basic hat and mittens on 2 needles hat 3 *free membership is required for download minimum information requested * 1 http //www patonsyarns com/data/pattern/pdf/patons_canadianaweb5_kn_hatmitts fr_ca pdf 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/basic-hat-and-mittens-on-4-needles-mittens 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/basic-hat-and-mittens-on-2-needles-hat
